title: Railway RRB Technician Gr-I & Grade-III Recruitment Online Form 2025
description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has released the official notification (CEN No. 02/2025) for Railway RRB Technician Recruitment 2025, opening 6,238 vacancies—including 183 for Technician Grade I (Signal) and 6,055 for Technician Grade III—across various RRB zones; the online application window is active from 28 June to 28 July 2025, with fee payment deadline also on 28 July 2025, and a correction window scheduled from 1 to 10 August 2025, offering a golden opportunity for candidates seeking RRB Technician Jobs 2025, Indian Railways recruitment, and railway government jobs. Candidates must be aged 18–33 years for Grade I and 18–30 years for Grade III as of 1 July 2025, with age relaxations for reserved categories; educational qualifications include B.Sc./Diploma/Degree in relevant engineering streams for Grade I and Matric plus ITI or apprenticeship in relevant trades for Grade III, aligning with eligibility requirements for RRB Technician eligibility 2025. The selection process comprises a Computer-Based Test (CBT) followed by Document Verification and Medical Examination, making exam preparation for the RRB Technician CBT 2025 crucial. Initial pay scales are ₹29,200 (Level 5) for Grade I and ₹19,900 (Level 2) for Grade III under the 7th CPC, making this a sought-after railway salary structure. The RRB Technician notification has generated strong interest and search trends around “RRB Technician apply online”, “RRB Technician exam date”, “RRB Technician salary”, and “RRB Technician vacancy”, highlighting its significance. Aspiring candidates should promptly complete registration, fee payment, document uploads, and revisions during the edit window, while regularly checking the official RRB websites for updates like admit card release, exam schedule, CBT pattern, and cut‑offs, to ensure a smooth application journey and improve chances of securing a rewarding career in Indian Railways as a skilled Technician.

title: railwayrrbtechnician 2 / Havaldar Recruitment 2025
description: The SSC MTS 2025 Recruitment, conducted by the Staff Selection Commission (SSC), offers opportunities for 10th-pass candidates to join as Multi-Tasking Staff (MTS) in various government departments and as Havaldar in CBIC and CBN. The notification was released on June 26, 2025, announcing 1,075 Havaldar vacancies, with MTS vacancies to be updated later. Candidates aged 18–25 (MTS/CBN) or 18–27 (CBIC/some MTS posts) can apply from June 26 to July 24, 2025 via ssc.gov.in. The Computer-Based Test (CBT) is scheduled from September 20 to October 24, 2025. The selection process includes CBT (Session 1 & 2), PET/PST (for Havaldar), and Document Verification. The pay scale is ₹18,000–₹22,000 (Level 1, 7th Pay Commission), making it an attractive Sarkari Naukri option. Stay updated at ssc.gov.in for results and further announcements.[](https://www.shiksha.com/exams/ssc-mts-exam)[](https://www.careerpower.in/ssc-mts.html)[](https://www.shiksha.com/exams/ssc-mts-exam-notification)
